title: Simulacrum (monster)
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For the spell, see [Simulacrum (spell)](/Simulacrum_\(spell\) "Simulacrum (spell)").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An ice replica of a monster that is animated by the powers of necromancy.***"The simulacrum now hides, not the truth, but the fact that there is none, that is to say, the continuation of Nothingness."-Jean Baudrillard, \_La Pens√©e Radicale\_. 1994. |

**Simulacra** are replicas of other monsters constructed out of ice. As a type of [derived undead](/Derived_undead "Derived undead"), their stats are based on what the monster had in life.

## Useful Info

Simulacrum are the most fragile type of derived undead. They are slower, stupider, and with less HP than their living counterparts, but gain [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage.

- **HP:** ([HD](/HD "HD"))d4 + 1\*HD
- **AC:** Original - 2
- **EV:** Original - 5
- **Speed:** Original - 2 (at least 3)
- **Melee attacks:** 80% of original
- **Attack flavour:** [Cold](/Cold "Cold") - does an extra (HD to 3\*HD - 1) cold damage per attack
- **Special:** Leaves behind a freezing [cloud](/Cloud "Cloud") when destroyed, does not regenerate, cannot traverse stairs

Simulacra are immune to poison, negative energy, torment, and cold damage, but are vulnerable to [fire](/Fire "Fire") and [holy](/Holy "Holy").

Simulacra are usually created by the player's [Sculpt Simulacrum](/Sculpt_Simulacrum "Sculpt Simulacrum") spell or monsters' [Bind Souls](/Bind_Souls "Bind Souls") spell. You may also find them in [Ice caves](/Ice_cave "Ice cave"), around [necromancers](/Necromancer "Necromancer") and [Josephina](/Josephina "Josephina"), and in certain [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Strategy

Simulacra can deal *brutal* amounts of cold damage, depending on the monster. Every one of a monster's attacks gets the cold attack flavour. For example, a regular [hydra](/Hydra "Hydra") deals up to 18 damage per head. A hydra simulacrum deals up to {14 physical + 39 cold} = *53* damage per head (over twice as much!).

Needless to say, if you're facing down a simulacrum or two, protect yourself with [cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance"). Simulacra are frail, so most types of ranged attacks can destroy them. Also, as they have poor [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), a [wand of paralysis](/Wand_of_paralysis "Wand of paralysis") can be very effective.

As player allies, simulacrum are some of the most powerful undead minions available. While they fall apart quickly, the damage can be astounding. Try to target foes with high [HD](/HD "HD") or multiple attacks.

## Identifying Simulacra

Though simulacra of different monsters have different stats, *Crawl* tends to lump them together, making identification at a glance difficult. In console mode, simulacra will be separated into **z**s and **Z**s, representing large or small simulacra. Tiles mode is more specific, providing unique tiles for several categories of monster, but there is still considerable variation within those categories. In either mode, you can always press **x** and highlight the simulacrum in question to determine exactly what type of monster you are dealing with.

Below are all the categories of simulacra in tiles mode:

[![Simulacrum bee.png](/images/4/44/Simulacrum_bee.png)](/File:Simulacrum_bee.png) - [Bee](/List_of_arthropods#Flying_insects "List of arthropods")

[![Simulacrum centaur.png](/images/0/04/Simulacrum_centaur.png)](/File:Simulacrum_centaur.png) - [Centaur](/List_of_centaurs "List of centaurs")

[![Simulacrum dragon.png](/images/3/33/Simulacrum_dragon.png)](/File:Simulacrum_dragon.png) - [Dragon](/List_of_dragons "List of dragons")

[![Simulacrum drake.png](/images/0/06/Simulacrum_drake.png)](/File:Simulacrum_drake.png) - Drake

[![Simulacrum fish.png](/images/3/31/Simulacrum_fish.png)](/File:Simulacrum_fish.png) - Fish

[![Simulacrum small humanoid.png](/images/9/9a/Simulacrum_small_humanoid.png)](/File:Simulacrum_small_humanoid.png) - Humanoid (small)

[![Simulacrum large humanoid.png](/images/c/c5/Simulacrum_large_humanoid.png)](/File:Simulacrum_large_humanoid.png) - Humanoid (large)

[![Simulacrum hydra 1.png](/images/5/55/Simulacrum_hydra_1.png)](/File:Simulacrum_hydra_1.png) [![Simulacrum hydra 2.png](/images/9/98/Simulacrum_hydra_2.png)](/File:Simulacrum_hydra_2.png) [![Simulacrum hydra 3.png](/images/c/c0/Simulacrum_hydra_3.png)](/File:Simulacrum_hydra_3.png) [![Simulacrum hydra 4.png](/images/4/46/Simulacrum_hydra_4.png)](/File:Simulacrum_hydra_4.png) [![Simulacrum hydra 5.png](/images/5/55/Simulacrum_hydra_5.png)](/File:Simulacrum_hydra_5.png) - [Hydra](/Hydra "Hydra")
